tasks.task: Sowing seeds in a planting field.
subtasks: Get seeds from storage or packaging.
Walk to the planting field.
Open seeds container and place seeds in planting area.
Dig planting holes or furrows with hands or a small tool.
Place seeds at the appropriate depth in the holes/furrows.
Cover seeds with soil.
Compact soil around the seeds with feet or hands.
Repeat for all required planting sites.

tasks.task: Applying fertilizer to the crop field.
subtasks: Retrieve fertilizer from storage area.
Transport fertilizer to the crop field.
Scatter or spread fertilizer evenly over the soil surface.
Incorporate fertilizer into the soil using a rake, hoe, or implement.
Check fertilizer distribution and adjust as necessary.

tasks.task: Operating a John Deere tractor to plow the field.
subtasks: Approach the tractor, ensuring it is in a parked position.
Attach plowing equipment to the tractor.
Start the tractor engine.
Position the tractor in the desired field location.
Engage the plow and begin the plowing operation.
Monitor the plowing progress and adjust as necessary.
Stop the tractor and disengage the plow after completing the task.

tasks.task: Loading hay onto a truck using a pitchfork.
subtasks: Harness the appropriate strength or pair of hands.
Approach the hay pile or bale stack.
Load hay onto the truck bed using the pitchfork, stacking layers.
Verify that the load is secure and balanced.
Descend from the truck and ensure the ramp is secure.
Identify equipment requiring cleaning or maintenance.
Shut off the equipment and allow it to cool if necessary.
Disassemble parts for cleaning or inspection.
Clean components with appropriate tools or solvents.
Check for damage, wear, or needed replacement parts.
Apply lubricants or greases as required.
Reassemble the equipment and test operation.

tasks.task: Transferring water from a reservoir to a field using hoses.
subtasks: Position the water reservoir near the field.
Connect hoses to the reservoir outlet and field inlet.
Turn on the reservoir's water supply.
Monitor water flow and adjust hose positions as needed.
Direct water flow to areas needing irrigation.
Disconnect hoses after completing irrigation.

tasks.task: Checking and adjusting irrigation system sprinklers.
subtasks: Walk through the irrigation area to assess sprinkler coverage.
Identify sprinklers with uneven water distribution or malfunctions.
Adjust sprinkler heads to direct water more evenly.
Lubricate or replace parts on faulty sprinklers.
Test adjusted sprinklers to confirm improved performance.

tasks.task: Herding cattle to a new pasture.
subtasks: Gather all cattle in the current pasture.
Move towards the new pasture, maintaining a steady path.
Ensure all cattle follow without stragglers.
Monitor cattle behavior and health during the move.

tasks.task: Spraying pesticides on crops using a backpack sprayer.
subtasks: Select the appropriate pesticide and fill the backpack sprayer.
Secure straps and adjust for comfort.
Walk through the crop rows, distributing pesticide evenly.
Cover the entire area, ensuring no missed spots.
Clean and store the sprayer after use.

tasks.task: Harvesting corn using a picker or combine.
subtasks: Approach the corn rows with the harvesting equipment.
Start the equipment's harvesting process.
Drive through the corn rows, separating kernels from the cob.
Collect the harvested corn into bins or containers.
Check for proper collection and clean-up afterward.

tasks.task: Repairing a broken fence surrounding a field.
subtasks: Locate the damaged portion of the fence.
Remove any fallen or displaced fence panels or posts.
Prepare replacement materials if needed.
Reattach or replace broken fence sections.
Tighten all connections and ensure stability.
Inspect the repaired fence for safety and effectiveness.

tasks.task: Trimming tree branches that interfere with field operations.
subtasks: Determine which branches are too low or causing interference.
